problem_names: lemma iso_intro: "(\<And>a. to (from a) = a) \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>b. from (to b) = b) \<Longrightarrow> iso from to"
translations: lemma iso_intro: "(\<And>a. to (from a) = a) \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>b. from (to b) = b) \<Longrightarrow> iso from to"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>a. to (from a) = a; \<And>b. from (to b) = b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> local.iso from to

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<And>a. to (from a) = a; \<And>b. from (to b) = b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> (\<forall>a. to (from a) = a) \<and>
                      (\<forall>b. from (to b) = b)
